85 void cblas_sgemm(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
86 const int M, const int N, const int K,
87 const float alpha, const float *A, const int lda,
88 const float *B, const int ldb,

92 const double alpha, const double *A, const int lda,
93 const double *B, const int ldb,
94 const double beta, double *C, const int ldc);

105// BLAS helper functions to select the correct function based on type
106template<typename T>
107inline T blas_dot(const int N, const T *X, const int incX, const T *Y, const int incY) {
108 // Fallback for unsupported types
109 T result = T();
110 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
111 result += X[i * incX] * Y[i * incY];
112 }
113 return result;
114}
115
116template<>
117inline float blas_dot<float>(const int N, const float *X, const int incX, const float *Y, const int incY) {
118 return cblas_sdot(N, X, incX, Y, incY);
119}
120
121template<>
122inline double blas_dot<double>(const int N, const double *X, const int incX, const double *Y, const int incY) {
123 return cblas_ddot(N, X, incX, Y, incY);
124}
125
126template<typename T>
127inline void blas_gemm(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
128 const int M, const int N, const int K,
129 const T alpha, const T *A, const int lda,
130 const T *B, const int ldb,
131 const T beta, T *C, const int ldc) {
132 // Fallback for unsupported types - standard matrix multiplication
133 for (int i = 0; i < M; ++i) {
134 for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) {
135 T sum = T();
136 for (int k = 0; k < K; ++k) {
137 sum += A[i * lda + k] * B[k * ldb + j];
138 }
139 C[i * ldc + j] = beta * C[i * ldc + j] + alpha * sum;
140 }
141 }
142}
143
144template<>
145inline void blas_gemm<float>(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
146 const int M, const int N, const int K,
147 const float alpha, const float *A, const int lda,
148 const float *B, const int ldb,
149 const float beta, float *C, const int ldc) {
150 cblas_sgemm(Order, TransA, TransB, M, N, K, alpha, A, lda, B, ldb, beta, C, ldc);
151}
152
153template<>
154inline void blas_gemm<double>(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
155 const int M, const int N, const int K,
156 const double alpha, const double *A, const int lda,
157 const double *B, const int ldb,
158 const double beta, double *C, const int ldc) {
159 cblas_dgemm(Order, TransA, TransB, M, N, K, alpha, A, lda, B, ldb, beta, C, ldc);
160}

170enum class Backend {
171 CPU,
172 BLAS,
173 GPU
174};
175
181inline std::string backend_name(Backend backend) {
182 switch (backend) {
183 case Backend::CPU: return "CPU";
184 case Backend::BLAS: return "BLAS";
185 case Backend::GPU: return "GPU";
186 default: return "Unknown";
187 }
188}
189
197inline Backend get_active_backend() {
198#ifdef USE_GPU
199 if (TensorGPU::is_gpu_available()) {
200 return Backend::GPU;
201 }
202#endif
203#ifdef USE_BLAS
204 return Backend::BLAS;
205#endif
206 return Backend::CPU;
207}

240enum class TensorError {
241 DimensionMismatch,
242 ContractionMismatch,
243 InvalidArgument,
244 SingularMatrix,
245 NotPositiveDefinite,
246 NotSquare,
247 EmptyMatrix,
248 LapackError,
249 NotImplemented
250};
251
257inline std::string to_string(TensorError error) {
258 switch (error) {
259 case TensorError::DimensionMismatch:
260 return "Tensor dimensions must match";
261 case TensorError::ContractionMismatch:
262 return "Contraction dimension must match";
263 case TensorError::InvalidArgument:
264 return "Invalid argument provided";
265 case TensorError::SingularMatrix:
266 return "Matrix is singular (non-invertible)";
267 case TensorError::NotPositiveDefinite:
268 return "Matrix is not positive definite";
269 case TensorError::NotSquare:
270 return "Operation requires square matrix";
271 case TensorError::EmptyMatrix:
272 return "Matrix is empty";
273 case TensorError::LapackError:
274 return "LAPACK routine error";
275 case TensorError::NotImplemented:
276 return "Feature not yet implemented";
277 default:
278 return "Unknown error";
279 }
280}

443template <typename T, size_t N>
444class Tensor {
445private:
446 std::unique_ptr<T[]> data_;
447 TensorIndices<N> dims_;
448 TensorIndices<N> strides_;
449 bool use_gpu_;
450
453 bool requires_grad_;
454 std::unique_ptr<Tensor<T, N>> grad_;
455 std::vector<BackwardFunc<T, N>> backward_funcs_;
456 bool is_leaf_;
458
464 size_t offset(const TensorIndices<N>& indices) const {
465 size_t off = 0;
466 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
467 off += indices[i] * strides_[i];
468 }
469 return off;
470 }
471
472 // Friend declaration to allow tensors of different dimensions to access each other's data
473 template <typename U, size_t M>
474 friend class Tensor;
475
476 // Friend declarations for TensorView and TensorSlice
477 template <typename U, size_t M>
478 friend class TensorView;
479 template <typename U, size_t M>
480 friend class TensorSlice;
481
482 // Friend declarations for I/O functions
483 template <typename U, size_t M>
484 friend bool save_binary(const Tensor<U, M>&, const std::string&);
485 template <typename U, size_t M>
486 friend bool save_text(const Tensor<U, M>&, const std::string&, int);
487 template <typename U, size_t M>
488 friend bool save_npy(const Tensor<U, M>&, const std::string&);
489 template <typename U, size_t M>
490 friend void print(const Tensor<U, M>&, std::ostream&, int, size_t, size_t);
491
492 // Friend declarations for scalar-first operators
493 template <typename U, size_t M>
494 friend Tensor<U, M> operator+(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
495 template <typename U, size_t M>
496 friend Tensor<U, M> operator-(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
497 template <typename U, size_t M>
498 friend Tensor<U, M> operator*(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
499 template <typename U, size_t M>
500 friend Tensor<U, M> operator/(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
501
502public:
503 // Public data accessors for use by library functions
504 const T* data_ptr() const { return data_.get(); }
505 T* data_ptr() { return data_.get(); }
506
511 size_t total_size() const {
512 size_t size = 1;
513 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
514 size *= dims_[i];
515 }
516 return size;
517 }
518
523 const T* data() const { return data_.get(); }
524 T* data() { return data_.get(); }
525
530 const TensorIndices<N>& strides() const { return strides_; }
531
532public:
533
540 Tensor(const TensorIndices<N>& dimensions, bool use_gpu = true, bool requires_grad = false)
541 : dims_(dimensions), requires_grad_(requires_grad), is_leaf_(true) {
542 size_t total = 1;
543 for (size_t i = N; i-- > 0;) {
544 strides_[i] = total;
545 total *= dims_[i];
546 }
547 data_ = std::make_unique<T[]>(total);
548#ifdef USE_GPU
549 use_gpu_ = use_gpu && TensorGPU::is_gpu_available();
550#else
551 use_gpu_ = false;
552#endif
553 if (requires_grad_) {
554 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
555 grad_->fill(T(0));
556 }
557 }
558
563 Tensor(const Tensor& other)
564 : dims_(other.dims_), strides_(other.strides_), use_gpu_(other.use_gpu_),
565 requires_grad_(other.requires_grad_), is_leaf_(other.is_leaf_),
566 backward_funcs_(other.backward_funcs_) {
567 size_t total = total_size();
568 data_ = std::make_unique<T[]>(total);
569 std::copy(other.data_.get(), other.data_.get() + total, data_.get());
570
571 // Copy gradient if it exists
572 if (other.grad_) {
573 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(*other.grad_);
574 }
575 }
576
582 Tensor& operator=(const Tensor& other) {
583 if (this != &other) {
584 dims_ = other.dims_;
585 strides_ = other.strides_;
586 use_gpu_ = other.use_gpu_;
587 requires_grad_ = other.requires_grad_;
588 is_leaf_ = other.is_leaf_;
589 backward_funcs_ = other.backward_funcs_;
590
591 size_t total = total_size();
592 data_ = std::make_unique<T[]>(total);
593 std::copy(other.data_.get(), other.data_.get() + total, data_.get());
594
595 // Copy gradient if it exists
596 if (other.grad_) {
597 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(*other.grad_);
598 } else {
599 grad_.reset();
600 }
601 }
602 return *this;
603 }
604
610 T& operator[](const TensorIndices<N>& indices) {
611 return data_[offset(indices)];
612 }
613
619 const T& operator[](const TensorIndices<N>& indices) const {
620 return data_[offset(indices)];
621 }
622
636 void fill(const T& value) {
637 std::fill(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), value);
638 }
639
644 TensorIndices<N> dims() const { return dims_; }
645
650 TensorIndices<N> shape() const { return dims_; }
651
656 bool uses_gpu() const { return use_gpu_; }
657
668 Backend backend() const {
669 if (use_gpu_) {
670 return Backend::GPU;
671 }
672#ifdef USE_BLAS
673 return Backend::BLAS;
674#else
675 return Backend::CPU;
676#endif
677 }

711
716 void set_requires_grad(bool requires_grad) {
717 requires_grad_ = requires_grad;
718 if (requires_grad_ && !grad_) {
719 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
720 grad_->fill(T(0));
721 }
722 }
723
728 bool requires_grad() const { return requires_grad_; }
729
734 bool is_leaf() const { return is_leaf_; }
735
740 Tensor<T, N>* grad() { return grad_.get(); }
741 const Tensor<T, N>* grad() const { return grad_.get(); }
742
746 void zero_grad() {
747 if (grad_) {
748 grad_->fill(T(0));
749 }
750 backward_funcs_.clear();
751 }
752
783 std::optional<TensorError> backward(const Tensor<T, N>* gradient = nullptr) {
784 if (!requires_grad_) {
785 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
786 }
787
788 // If this is not a scalar and no gradient provided, error
789 if (!gradient && total_size() != 1) {
790 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
791 }
792
793 // Initialize gradient
794 if (!grad_) {
795 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
796 grad_->fill(T(0));
797 }
798
799 if (gradient) {
800 // Accumulate provided gradient
801 size_t total = total_size();
802 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
803 grad_->data_[i] += gradient->data_[i];
804 }
805 } else {
806 // For scalar, start with gradient of 1
807 grad_->data_[0] = T(1);
808 }
809
810 // Call all backward functions to propagate gradients
811 for (auto& func : backward_funcs_) {
812 func(*grad_);
813 }
814
815 return std::nullopt;
816 }
817
822 Tensor<T, N> detach() const {
823 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
824 size_t total = total_size();
825 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total, result.data_.get());
826 return result;
827 }
828
833 void register_backward(BackwardFunc<T, N> func) {
834 backward_funcs_.push_back(func);
835 }
836
867 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator+(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
868 if (dims_ != other.dims_) {
869 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
870 }
871
872 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
873 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, track_grad);
874 result.is_leaf_ = false;
875 size_t total = total_size();
876
877#ifdef USE_GPU
878 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
879 TensorGPU::add_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
880 } else
881#endif
882 {
883 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
884 result.data_[i] = data_[i] + other.data_[i];
885 }
886 }
887
888 // Setup backward pass
889 if (track_grad) {
890 // Capture pointers to input tensors
891 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
892 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
893
894 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
895 // Gradient of addition: d/dx(x+y) = 1, d/dy(x+y) = 1
896 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
897 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
898 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
899 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
900 }
901 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
902 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
903 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
904 }
905
906 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
907 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
908 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
909 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
910 }
911 }
912 }
913
914 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
915 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
916 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
917 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
918 }
919 size_t total = other_ptr->total_size();
920 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
921 other_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
922 }
923
924 // If other is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
925 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
926 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
927 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
928 }
929 }
930 }
931 });
932 }
933
934 return result;
935 }
936
943 Tensor<T, N> operator+(const T& scalar) const {
944 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
945 result.is_leaf_ = false;
946 size_t total = total_size();
947
948#ifdef USE_GPU
949 if (use_gpu_) {
950 TensorGPU::add_scalar_gpu(data_.get(), scalar, result.data_.get(), total);
951 } else
952#endif
953 {
954 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
955 result.data_[i] = data_[i] + scalar;
956 }
957 }
958
959 // Setup backward pass
960 if (requires_grad_) {
961 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
962
963 result.register_backward([self_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
964 // Gradient of addition with scalar: d/dx(x+c) = 1
965 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
966 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
967 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
968 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
969 }
970 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
971 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
972 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
973 }
974
975 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
976 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
977 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
978 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
979 }
980 }
981 }
982 });
983 }
984
985 return result;
986 }
987
994 Tensor<T, N>& operator+=(const Tensor<T, N>& other) {
995 if (dims_ != other.dims_) {
996 return *this;
997 }
998
999 size_t total = total_size();
1000#ifdef USE_GPU
1001 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
1002 TensorGPU::add_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), data_.get(), total);
1003 } else
1004#endif
1005 {
1006 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1007 data_[i] += other.data_[i];
1008 }
1009 }
1010
1011 return *this;
1012 }
1013
1019 Tensor<T, N>& operator+=(const T& scalar) {
1020 size_t total = total_size();
1021#ifdef USE_GPU
1022 if (use_gpu_) {
1023 TensorGPU::add_scalar_gpu(data_.get(), scalar, data_.get(), total);
1024 } else
1025#endif
1026 {
1027 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1028 data_[i] += scalar;
1029 }
1030 }
1031 return *this;
1032 }
1033
1039 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator-(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
1040 if (dims_ != other.dims_) {
1041 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
1042 }
1043
1044 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
1045 size_t total = total_size();
1046
1047#ifdef USE_GPU
1048 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
1049 TensorGPU::sub_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
1050 } else
1051#endif
1052 {
1053 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1054 result.data_[i] = data_[i] - other.data_[i];
1055 }
1056 }
1057
1058 return result;
1059 }
1060
1066 Tensor<T, N> operator-(const T& scalar) const {
1067 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
1068 size_t total = total_size();
1069
1070#ifdef USE_GPU
1071 if (use_gpu_) {
1072 TensorGPU::sub_scalar_gpu(data_.get(), scalar, result.data_.get(), total);
1073 } else
1074#endif
1075 {
1076 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1077 result.data_[i] = data_[i] - scalar;
1078 }
1079 }
1080
1081 return result;
1082 }
1083
1090 Tensor<T, N>& operator-=(const Tensor<T, N>& other) {
1091 if (dims_ != other.dims_) {
1092 return *this;
1093 }
1094
1095 size_t total = total_size();
1096#ifdef USE_GPU
1097 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
1098 TensorGPU::sub_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), data_.get(), total);
1099 } else
1100#endif
1101 {
1102 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1103 data_[i] -= other.data_[i];
1104 }
1105 }
1106
1107 return *this;
1108 }
1109
1115 Tensor<T, N>& operator-=(const T& scalar) {
1116 size_t total = total_size();
1117#ifdef USE_GPU
1118 if (use_gpu_) {
1119 TensorGPU::sub_scalar_gpu(data_.get(), scalar, data_.get(), total);
1120 } else
1121#endif
1122 {
1123 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1124 data_[i] -= scalar;
1125 }
1126 }
1127 return *this;
1128 }
1129
1136 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator*(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
1137 if (dims_ != other.dims_) {
1138 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
1139 }
1140
1141 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
1142 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, track_grad);
1143 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1144 size_t total = total_size();
1145
1146#ifdef USE_GPU
1147 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
1148 TensorGPU::mul_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
1149 } else
1150#endif
1151 {
1152 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1153 result.data_[i] = data_[i] * other.data_[i];
1154 }
1155 }
1156
1157 // Setup backward pass
1158 if (track_grad) {
1159 // Need to store copies of input data for gradient computation
1160 Tensor<T, N> self_copy = this->detach();
1161 Tensor<T, N> other_copy = other.detach();
1162 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1163 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
1164
1165 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr, self_copy, other_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1166 // Gradient of multiplication: d/dx(x*y) = y, d/dy(x*y) = x
1167 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1168 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1169 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1170 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1171 }
1172 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
1173 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1174 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i] * other_copy.data_[i];
1175 }
1176
1177 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1178 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1179 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1180 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1181 }
1182 }
1183 }
1184
1185 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1186 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
1187 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1188 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1189 }
1190 size_t total = other_ptr->total_size();
1191 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1192 other_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i] * self_copy.data_[i];
1193 }
1194
1195 // If other is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1196 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1197 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1198 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
1199 }
1200 }
1201 }
1202 });
1203 }
1204
1205 return result;
1206 }
1207
1214 Tensor<T, N> operator*(const T& scalar) const {
1215 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
1216 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1217 size_t total = total_size();
1218
1219#ifdef USE_GPU
1220 if (use_gpu_) {
1221 TensorGPU::mul_scalar_gpu(data_.get(), scalar, result.data_.get(), total);
1222 } else
1223#endif
1224 {
1225 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1226 result.data_[i] = data_[i] * scalar;
1227 }
1228 }
1229
1230 // Setup backward pass
1231 if (requires_grad_) {
1232 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1233
1234 result.register_backward([self_ptr, scalar](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1235 // Gradient of multiplication with scalar: d/dx(x*c) = c
1236 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1237 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1238 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1239 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1240 }
1241 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
1242 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1243 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i] * scalar;
1244 }
1245
1246 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1247 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1248 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1249 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1250 }
1251 }
1252 }
1253 });
1254 }
1255
1256 return result;
1257 }

1778 Tensor<T, N> sigmoid() const {
1779 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
1780 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1781 size_t total = total_size();
1782
1783#ifdef USE_GPU
1784 if (use_gpu_) {
1785 TensorGPU::sigmoid_gpu(data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
1786 } else
1787#endif
1788 {
1789 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1790 result.data_[i] = T(1) / (T(1) + std::exp(-data_[i]));
1791 }
1792 }
1793
1794 // Setup backward pass
1795 if (requires_grad_) {
1796 Tensor<T, N> output_copy = result.detach();
1797 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1798
1799 result.register_backward([self_ptr, output_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1800 // Gradient of sigmoid: d/dx[sigmoid(x)] = sigmoid(x) * (1 - sigmoid(x))
1801 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1802 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1803 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1804 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1805 }
1806 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
1807 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1808 T sig = output_copy.data_[i];
1809 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i] * sig * (T(1) - sig);
1810 }
1811
1812 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1813 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1814 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1815 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1816 }
1817 }
1818 }
1819 });
1820 }
1821
1822 return result;
1823 }
1824
1857 Tensor<T, N> relu() const {
1858 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
1859 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1860 size_t total = total_size();
1861
1862#ifdef USE_GPU
1863 if (use_gpu_) {
1864 TensorGPU::relu_gpu(data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
1865 } else
1866#endif
1867 {
1868 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1869 result.data_[i] = data_[i] > T(0) ? data_[i] : T(0);
1870 }
1871 }
1872
1873 // Setup backward pass
1874 if (requires_grad_) {
1875 Tensor<T, N> input_copy = this->detach();
1876 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1877
1878 result.register_backward([self_ptr, input_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1879 // Gradient of ReLU: d/dx[ReLU(x)] = 1 if x > 0, else 0
1880 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1881 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1882 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1883 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1884 }
1885 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
1886 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1887 if (input_copy.data_[i] > T(0)) {
1888 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
1889 }
1890 }
1891 }
1892 });
1893 }
1894
1895 return result;
1896 }

2025 template<typename C>
2026 static Tensor<T, N> where(const Tensor<C, N>& condition, const Tensor<T, N>& x, const Tensor<T, N>& y) {
2027 if (condition.dims() != x.dims() || x.dims() != y.dims()) {
2028 throw std::invalid_argument("where(): all tensors must have the same shape");
2029 }
2030
2031 Tensor<T, N> result(x.dims(), x.use_gpu_);
2032 size_t total = x.total_size();
2033
2034 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2035 result.data_[i] = condition.data()[i] ? x.data_[i] : y.data_[i];
2036 }
2037
2038 return result;
2039 }

2194 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> chain_rule(const Tensor<T, N>& upstream_grad) const {
2195 if (dims_ != upstream_grad.dims_) {
2196 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2197 }
2198
2199 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
2200 size_t total = total_size();
2201
2202 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2203 result.data_[i] = data_[i] * upstream_grad.data_[i];
2204 }
2205
2206 return result;
2207 }

2212
2234 T sum() const {
2235 T result = T(0);
2236 size_t total = total_size();
2237
2238 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2239 result += data_[i];
2240 }
2241
2242 return result;
2243 }
2244
2268 T mean() const {
2269 return sum() / static_cast<T>(total_size());
2270 }
2271
2300 T variance(size_t ddof = 0) const {
2301 T m = mean();
2302 T var = T(0);
2303 size_t total = total_size();
2304
2305 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2306 T diff = data_[i] - m;
2307 var += diff * diff;
2308 }
2309
2310 return var / static_cast<T>(total - ddof);
2311 }
2312
2318 T std(size_t ddof = 0) const {
2319 return std::sqrt(variance(ddof));
2320 }
2321
2329 TensorResult<T> covariance(const Tensor<T, N>& other, size_t ddof = 0) const {
2330 if (total_size() != other.total_size()) {
2331 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2332 }
2333
2334 size_t total = total_size();
2335 if (total <= ddof) {
2336 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
2337 }
2338
2339 T mean1 = mean();
2340 T mean2 = other.mean();
2341 T cov = T(0);
2342
2343 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2344 cov += (data_[i] - mean1) * (other.data_[i] - mean2);
2345 }
2346
2347 return cov / static_cast<T>(total - ddof);
2348 }
2349
2356 TensorResult<T> correlation(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
2357 if (total_size() != other.total_size()) {
2358 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2359 }
2360
2361 size_t total = total_size();
2362 T mean1 = mean();
2363 T mean2 = other.mean();
2364
2365 T cov = T(0);
2366 T var1 = T(0);
2367 T var2 = T(0);
2368
2369 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2370 T diff1 = data_[i] - mean1;
2371 T diff2 = other.data_[i] - mean2;
2372 cov += diff1 * diff2;
2373 var1 += diff1 * diff1;
2374 var2 += diff2 * diff2;
2375 }
2376
2377 T denom = std::sqrt(var1 * var2);
2378 if (denom < std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon()) {
2379 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
2380 }
2381
2382 return cov / denom;
2383 }
2384
2390 T median() const {
2391 size_t total = total_size();
2392 std::vector<T> sorted_data(data_.get(), data_.get() + total);
2393 std::sort(sorted_data.begin(), sorted_data.end());
2394
2395 if (total % 2 == 0) {
2396 return (sorted_data[total/2 - 1] + sorted_data[total/2]) / T(2);
2397 } else {
2398 return sorted_data[total/2];
2399 }
2400 }
2401
2407 TensorResult<T> quantile(T q) const {
2408 if (q < T(0) || q > T(1)) {
2409 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
2410 }
2411
2412 size_t total = total_size();
2413 std::vector<T> sorted_data(data_.get(), data_.get() + total);
2414 std::sort(sorted_data.begin(), sorted_data.end());
2415
2416 T pos = q * static_cast<T>(total - 1);
2417 size_t lower = static_cast<size_t>(pos);
2418 size_t upper = lower + 1;
2419
2420 if (upper >= total) {
2421 return sorted_data[total - 1];
2422 }
2423
2424 T frac = pos - static_cast<T>(lower);
2425 return sorted_data[lower] * (T(1) - frac) + sorted_data[upper] * frac;
2426 }
2427
2432 T min() const {
2433 size_t total = total_size();
2434 T min_val = data_[0];
2435 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {
2436 if (data_[i] < min_val) {
2437 min_val = data_[i];
2438 }
2439 }
2440 return min_val;
2441 }
2442
2447 T max() const {
2448 size_t total = total_size();
2449 T max_val = data_[0];
2450 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {
2451 if (data_[i] > max_val) {
2452 max_val = data_[i];
2453 }
2454 }
2455 return max_val;
2456 }
2457
2463 TensorResult<T> spearman_correlation(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
2464 if (total_size() != other.total_size()) {
2465 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2466 }
2467
2468 size_t total = total_size();
2469
2470 // Create rank vectors
2471 std::vector<std::pair<T, size_t>> data1(total);
2472 std::vector<std::pair<T, size_t>> data2(total);
2473
2474 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2475 data1[i] = {data_[i], i};
2476 data2[i] = {other.data_[i], i};
2477 }
2478
2479 // Sort by value
2480 std::sort(data1.begin(), data1.end());
2481 std::sort(data2.begin(), data2.end());
2482
2483 // Assign ranks
2484 std::vector<T> rank1(total);
2485 std::vector<T> rank2(total);
2486
2487 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2488 rank1[data1[i].second] = static_cast<T>(i + 1);
2489 rank2[data2[i].second] = static_cast<T>(i + 1);
2490 }
2491
2492 // Compute Pearson correlation on ranks
2493 T sum_d_squared = T(0);
2494 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2495 T diff = rank1[i] - rank2[i];
2496 sum_d_squared += diff * diff;
2497 }
2498
2499 T n = static_cast<T>(total);
2500 return T(1) - (T(6) * sum_d_squared) / (n * (n * n - T(1)));
2501 }
2502
2508 Tensor<T, N> normalize(size_t ddof = 0) const {
2509 T m = mean();
2510 T s = std(ddof);
2511
2512 if (s < std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon()) {
2513 // If std is zero, just center the data
2514 return *this - m;
2515 }
2516
2517 return (*this - m) / s;
2518 }
2519
2524 Tensor<T, N> standardize() const {
2525 T min_val = min();
2526 T max_val = max();
2527 T range = max_val - min_val;
2528
2529 if (range < std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon()) {
2530 // If all values are the same, return zeros
2531 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
2532 result.fill(T(0));
2533 return result;
2534 }
2535
2536 return (*this - min_val) / range;
2537 }
2538
2544 Tensor<T, N> square() const {
2545 return map([](T x) { return x * x; });
2546 }

2749
2756 Tensor<T, N> clip(T min_val, T max_val) const {
2757 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
2758 result.is_leaf_ = false;
2759 size_t total = total_size();
2760
2761 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2762 result.data_[i] = std::max(min_val, std::min(max_val, data_[i]));
2763 }
2764
2765 // Setup backward pass
2766 if (requires_grad_) {
2767 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
2768
2769 result.register_backward([self_ptr, min_val, max_val](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
2770 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
2771 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
2772 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
2773 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
2774 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
2775 }
2776
2777 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
2778 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2779 // Gradient passes through only if value is within range
2780 if (self_ptr->data_[i] > min_val && self_ptr->data_[i] < max_val) {
2781 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
2782 }
2783 }
2784
2785 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
2786 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
2787 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
2788 }
2789 }
2790 }
2791 });
2792 }
2793
2794 return result;
2795 }

2804 template<typename M>
2805 Tensor<T, N> masked_fill(const Tensor<M, N>& mask, T fill_value) const {
2806 if (dims_ != mask.dims()) {
2807 return *this;
2808 }
2809
2810 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
2811 size_t total = total_size();
2812
2813 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2814 result.data_[i] = (mask.data()[i] != M(0)) ? fill_value : data_[i];
2815 }
2816
2817 return result;
2818 }

2826 template<typename M>
2827 Tensor<T, 1> masked_select(const Tensor<M, N>& mask) const {
2828 if (dims_ != mask.dims()) {
2829 return Tensor<T, 1>({0}, use_gpu_);
2830 }
2831
2832 // Count how many values to select
2833 size_t total = total_size();
2834 size_t count = 0;
2835 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2836 if (mask.data()[i] != M(0)) {
2837 count++;
2838 }
2839 }
2840
2841 Tensor<T, 1> result({count}, use_gpu_);
2842 size_t idx = 0;
2843 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2844 if (mask.data()[i] != M(0)) {
2845 result.data_[idx++] = data_[i];
2846 }
2847 }
2848
2849 return result;
2850 }

2865 template <typename U>
2866 Tensor<U, N> astype() const {
2867 Tensor<U, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
2868 size_t total = total_size();
2869
2870 const T* src_data = data_ptr();
2871 U* dst_data = result.data_ptr();
2872
2873 #pragma omp parallel for if(total > 10000)
2874 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2875 dst_data[i] = static_cast<U>(src_data[i]);
2876 }
2877
2878 return result;
2879 }

2909 void uniform(T low = T(0), T high = T(1)) {
2910 size_t total = total_size();
2911 std::random_device rd;
2912 std::mt19937 gen(rd());
2913 std::uniform_real_distribution<> dis(static_cast<double>(low), static_cast<double>(high));
2914
2915 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2916 data_[i] = static_cast<T>(dis(gen));
2917 }
2918 }

2924 void bernoulli(T p = T(0.5)) {
2925 size_t total = total_size();
2926 std::random_device rd;
2927 std::mt19937 gen(rd());
2928 std::bernoulli_distribution dis(static_cast<double>(p));
2929
2930 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2931 data_[i] = dis(gen) ? T(1) : T(0);
2932 }
2933 }

2941 template<size_t... Dims>
2942 static Tensor<T, N+1> stack(const std::vector<Tensor<T, N>>& tensors, size_t dim = 0) {
2943 if (tensors.empty()) {
2944 return Tensor<T, N+1>({0}, false);
2945 }
2946
2947 if (dim > N) {
2948 return Tensor<T, N+1>({0}, false);
2949 }
2950
2951 // Check all tensors have the same shape
2952 const auto& first_dims = tensors[0].dims_;
2953 for (const auto& t : tensors) {
2954 if (t.dims_ != first_dims) {
2955 return Tensor<T, N+1>({0}, false);
2956 }
2957 }
2958
2959 // Compute new dimensions
2960 TensorIndices<N+1> new_dims;
2961 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim; ++i) {
2962 new_dims[i] = first_dims[i];
2963 }
2964 new_dims[dim] = tensors.size();
2965 for (size_t i = dim; i < N; ++i) {
2966 new_dims[i+1] = first_dims[i];
2967 }
2968
2969 Tensor<T, N+1> result(new_dims, tensors[0].use_gpu_);
2970
2971 // Copy data
2972 size_t slice_size = tensors[0].total_size();
2973 for (size_t t = 0; t < tensors.size(); ++t) {
2974 size_t offset = t * slice_size;
2975 std::copy(tensors[t].data_.get(), tensors[t].data_.get() + slice_size,
2976 result.data_.get() + offset);
2977 }
2978
2979 return result;
2980 }
2981
2987 static Tensor<T, N> vstack(const std::vector<Tensor<T, N>>& tensors) {
2988 static_assert(N >= 2, "vstack requires at least 2D tensors");
2989
2990 if (tensors.empty()) {
2991 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
2992 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, false);
2993 }
2994
2995 if (tensors.size() == 1) {
2996 return Tensor<T, N>(tensors[0]);
2997 }
2998
2999 // Start with first tensor and concatenate the rest
3000 Tensor<T, N> result(tensors[0]);
3001 for (size_t i = 1; i < tensors.size(); ++i) {
3002 result = result.concatenate(tensors[i], 0);
3003 }
3004
3005 return result;
3006 }
3007
3013 static Tensor<T, N> hstack(const std::vector<Tensor<T, N>>& tensors) {
3014 static_assert(N >= 2, "hstack requires at least 2D tensors");
3015
3016 if (tensors.empty()) {
3017 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3018 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, false);
3019 }
3020
3021 if (tensors.size() == 1) {
3022 return Tensor<T, N>(tensors[0]);
3023 }
3024
3025 // Start with first tensor and concatenate the rest
3026 Tensor<T, N> result(tensors[0]);
3027 for (size_t i = 1; i < tensors.size(); ++i) {
3028 result = result.concatenate(tensors[i], 1);
3029 }
3030
3031 return result;
3032 }

3036 // ============================================
3037
3043 TensorResult<T> mse_loss(const Tensor<T, N>& target) const {
3044 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3045 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3046 }
3047
3048 T loss = T(0);
3049 size_t total = total_size();
3050
3051 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3052 T diff = data_[i] - target.data_[i];
3053 loss += diff * diff;
3054 }
3055
3056 return loss / static_cast<T>(total);
3057 }
3058
3065 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> mse_loss_gradient(const Tensor<T, N>& target) const {
3066 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3067 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3068 }
3069
3070 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
3071 size_t total = total_size();
3072 T scale = T(2) / static_cast<T>(total);
3073
3074 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3075 result.data_[i] = scale * (data_[i] - target.data_[i]);
3076 }
3077
3078 return result;
3079 }
3080
3088 TensorResult<T> binary_crossentropy_loss(const Tensor<T, N>& target, T epsilon = T(1e-7)) const {
3089 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3090 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3091 }
3092
3093 T loss = T(0);
3094 size_t total = total_size();
3095
3096 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3097 T pred = std::max(epsilon, std::min(T(1) - epsilon, data_[i]));
3098 loss += -(target.data_[i] * std::log(pred) +
3099 (T(1) - target.data_[i]) * std::log(T(1) - pred));
3100 }
3101
3102 return loss / static_cast<T>(total);
3103 }
3104
3112 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> binary_crossentropy_gradient(const Tensor<T, N>& target,
3113 T epsilon = T(1e-7)) const {
3114 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3115 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3116 }
3117
3118 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
3119 size_t total = total_size();
3120 T scale = T(1) / static_cast<T>(total);
3121
3122 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3123 T pred = std::max(epsilon, std::min(T(1) - epsilon, data_[i]));
3124 result.data_[i] = scale * (-(target.data_[i] / pred) +
3125 ((T(1) - target.data_[i]) / (T(1) - pred)));
3126 }
3127
3128 return result;
3129 }
3130
3138 template<size_t M = N>
3139 typename std::enable_if<M == 1, TensorResult<T>>::type
3140 dot(const Tensor<T, 1>& other) const {
3141 static_assert(N == 1, "This dot product is only for 1D tensors");
3142 if (dims_[0] != other.dims_[0]) {
3143 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3144 }
3145
3146 T result = T();
3147
3148#ifdef USE_GPU
3149 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3150 TensorGPU::dot_1d_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), &result, dims_[0]);
3151 return result;
3152 }
3153#endif
3154
3155#ifdef USE_BLAS
3156 if (!use_gpu_) {
3157 return blas_dot<T>(dims_[0], data_.get(), 1, other.data_.get(), 1);
3158 }
3159#endif
3160
3161 for (size_t i = 0; i < dims_[0]; ++i) {
3162 result += data_[i] * other.data_[i];
3163 }
3164 return result;
3165 }
3166
3174 template<size_t M = N>
3175 typename std::enable_if<M == 2, TensorResult<Tensor<T, 2>>>::type
3176 dot(const Tensor<T, 2>& other) const {
3177 static_assert(N == 2, "This dot product is only for 2D tensors");
3178 if (dims_[1] != other.dims_[0]) {
3179 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3180 }
3181
3182 size_t m = dims_[0];
3183 size_t n = dims_[1];
3184 size_t p = other.dims_[1];
3185
3186 Tensor<T, 2> result({m, p}, use_gpu_);
3187 result.fill(T());
3188
3189#ifdef USE_GPU
3190 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3191 TensorGPU::dot_2d_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), m, n, p);
3192 return result;
3193 }
3194#endif
3195
3196#ifdef USE_BLAS
3197 if (!use_gpu_) {
3198 // BLAS gemm: C = alpha * A * B + beta * C
3199 // A is mn, B is np, C is mp
3200 blas_gemm<T>(CblasRowMajor, CblasNoTrans, CblasNoTrans,
3201 m, p, n, T(1), data_.get(), n,
3202 other.data_.get(), p, T(0), result.data_.get(), p);
3203 return result;
3204 }
3205#endif
3206
3207 auto row_range = std::views::iota(size_t(0), m);
3208 std::for_each(std::execution::par, row_range.begin(), row_range.end(),
3209 [&](size_t i) {
3210 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3211 T sum = T();
3212 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3213 sum += (*this)[{i, k}] * other[{k, j}];
3214 }
3215 result[{i, j}] = sum;
3216 }
3217 });
3218 return result;
3219 }
3220
3234 template<size_t M = N, size_t P>
3235 typename std::enable_if<(M >= 3), TensorResult<Tensor<T, N + P - 2>>>::type
3236 dot(const Tensor<T, P>& other) const {
3237 static_assert(N >= 3 || P >= 1, "This dot product is for higher dimensional tensors");
3238
3239 // Check that the last dimension of this matches first dimension of other
3240 if (dims_[N - 1] != other.dims_[0]) {
3241 return TensorError::ContractionMismatch;
3242 }
3243
3244 size_t contract_dim = dims_[N - 1];
3245
3246 // Calculate output dimensions: all dims of this except last,
3247 // plus all dims of other except first
3248 TensorIndices<N + P - 2> result_dims;
3249 for (size_t i = 0; i < N - 1; ++i) {
3250 result_dims[i] = dims_[i];
3251 }
3252 for (size_t i = 1; i < P; ++i) {
3253 result_dims[N - 1 + i - 1] = other.dims_[i];
3254 }
3255
3256 Tensor<T, N + P - 2> result(result_dims, use_gpu_);
3257 result.fill(T());
3258
3259 // Calculate strides for output indexing
3260 size_t outer_size = 1; // Product of all dims except last in this tensor
3261 for (size_t i = 0; i < N - 1; ++i) {
3262 outer_size *= dims_[i];
3263 }
3264
3265 size_t inner_size = 1; // Product of all dims except first in other tensor
3266 for (size_t i = 1; i < P; ++i) {
3267 inner_size *= other.dims_[i];
3268 }
3269
3270#ifdef USE_GPU
3271 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3272 TensorGPU::dot_nd_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(),
3273 outer_size, contract_dim, inner_size);
3274 return result;
3275 }
3276#endif
3277
3278 // Perform contraction with parallel execution
3279 auto outer_range = std::views::iota(size_t(0), outer_size);
3280 std::for_each(std::execution::par, outer_range.begin(), outer_range.end(),
3281 [&](size_t outer) {
3282 for (size_t inner = 0; inner < inner_size; ++inner) {
3283 T sum = T();
3284 for (size_t k = 0; k < contract_dim; ++k) {
3285 // Calculate flat indices for input tensors
3286 size_t idx_this = outer * contract_dim + k;
3287 size_t idx_other = k * inner_size + inner;
3288 sum += data_[idx_this] * other.data_[idx_other];
3289 }
3290 // Calculate flat index for output tensor
3291 size_t idx_result = outer * inner_size + inner;
3292 result.data_[idx_result] = sum;
3293 }
3294 });
3295
3296 return result;
3297 }
3298
3326 template<size_t M = N>
3327 typename std::enable_if<M == 1, TensorResult<Tensor<T, 1>>>::type
3328 cross(const Tensor<T, 1>& other) const {
3329 static_assert(N == 1, "Cross product is only for 1D tensors");
3330 if (dims_[0] != 3) {
3331 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3332 }
3333 if (other.dims_[0] != 3) {
3334 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3335 }
3336
3337 Tensor<T, 1> result({3}, use_gpu_);
3338
3339 // Cross product formula: a b = [a2*b3 - a3*b2, a3*b1 - a1*b3, a1*b2 - a2*b1]
3340 T a1 = data_[0], a2 = data_[1], a3 = data_[2];
3341 T b1 = other.data_[0], b2 = other.data_[1], b3 = other.data_[2];
3342
3343#ifdef USE_GPU
3344 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3345 TensorGPU::cross_3d_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get());
3346 return result;
3347 }
3348#endif
3349
3350 result.data_[0] = a2 * b3 - a3 * b2;
3351 result.data_[1] = a3 * b1 - a1 * b3;
3352 result.data_[2] = a1 * b2 - a2 * b1;
3353
3354 return result;
3355 }
3356
3357 // ============================================
3358 // Phase 1: Core Neural Network Operations
3359 // ============================================
3360
3404 template<size_t M = N>
3405 typename std::enable_if<M == 2, TensorResult<Tensor<T, 2>>>::type
3406 matmul(const Tensor<T, 2>& other) const {
3407 static_assert(N == 2, "matmul requires 2D tensors");
3408
3409 if (dims_[1] != other.dims_[0]) {
3410 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3411 }
3412
3413 size_t m = dims_[0];
3414 size_t n = dims_[1];
3415 size_t p = other.dims_[1];
3416
3417 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
3418 Tensor<T, 2> result({m, p}, use_gpu_, track_grad);
3419 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3420 result.fill(T(0));
3421
3422 // Forward pass - use existing optimized dot product
3423#ifdef USE_BLAS
3424 if (!use_gpu_) {
3425 blas_gemm<T>(CblasRowMajor, CblasNoTrans, CblasNoTrans,
3426 m, p, n, T(1), data_.get(), n,
3427 other.data_.get(), p, T(0), result.data_.get(), p);
3428 } else
3429#endif
3430 {
3431 for (size_t i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
3432 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3433 T sum = T(0);
3434 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3435 sum += (*this)[{i, k}] * other[{k, j}];
3436 }
3437 result[{i, j}] = sum;
3438 }
3439 }
3440 }
3441
3442 // Setup backward pass for autograd
3443 if (track_grad) {
3444 Tensor<T, 2> self_copy = this->detach();
3445 Tensor<T, 2> other_copy = other.detach();
3446 Tensor<T, 2>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, 2>*>(this);
3447 Tensor<T, 2>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, 2>*>(&other);
3448
3449 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr, self_copy, other_copy, m, n, p]
3450 (const Tensor<T, 2>& grad) {
3451 // Gradient for matmul:
3452 // If C = A @ B, then:
3453 // dL/dA = dL/dC @ B^T
3454 // dL/dB = A^T @ dL/dC
3455
3456 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3457 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3458 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, 2>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3459 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3460 }
3461
3462 // dL/dA = grad @ other^T
3463 for (size_t i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
3464 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3465 T sum = T(0);
3466 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3467 sum += grad[{i, j}] * other_copy[{k, j}];
3468 }
3469 (*self_ptr->grad_)[{i, k}] += sum;
3470 }
3471 }
3472
3473 // Propagate further if not leaf
3474 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3475 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3476 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3477 }
3478 }
3479 }
3480
3481 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3482 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
3483 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, 2>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3484 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3485 }
3486
3487 // dL/dB = self^T @ grad
3488 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3489 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3490 T sum = T(0);
3491 for (size_t i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
3492 sum += self_copy[{i, k}] * grad[{i, j}];
3493 }
3494 (*other_ptr->grad_)[{k, j}] += sum;
3495 }
3496 }
3497
3498 // Propagate further if not leaf
3499 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3500 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3501 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
3502 }
3503 }
3504 }
3505 });
3506 }
3507
3508 return result;
3509 }
3510
3517 Tensor<T, N> sum_axis(int axis, bool keepdims = false) const {
3518 if (axis < 0) {
3519 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3520 }
3521
3522 if (axis < 0 || axis >= static_cast<int>(N)) {
3523 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3524 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3525 }
3526
3527 size_t ax = static_cast<size_t>(axis);
3528
3529 // Compute output dimensions
3530 TensorIndices<N> result_dims = dims_;
3531 if (keepdims) {
3532 result_dims[ax] = 1;
3533 } else {
3534 // For now, keep the dimension but set to 1
3535 // A proper implementation would reduce the tensor rank
3536 result_dims[ax] = 1;
3537 }
3538
3539 Tensor<T, N> result(result_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3540 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3541 result.fill(T(0));
3542
3543 // Compute sum
3544 size_t outer = 1;
3545 for (size_t i = 0; i < ax; ++i) {
3546 outer *= dims_[i];
3547 }
3548
3549 size_t reduce_dim = dims_[ax];
3550
3551 size_t inner = 1;
3552 for (size_t i = ax + 1; i < N; ++i) {
3553 inner *= dims_[i];
3554 }
3555
3556 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
3557 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
3558 T sum = T(0);
3559 for (size_t r = 0; r < reduce_dim; ++r) {
3560 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3561 size_t linear_idx = o * reduce_dim * inner + r * inner + i;
3562
3563 // Convert linear index to multi-dimensional
3564 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3565 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3566 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3567 temp /= dims_[d];
3568 }
3569
3570 sum += (*this)[idx];
3571 }
3572
3573 TensorIndices<N> result_idx;
3574 size_t result_linear = o * inner + i;
3575 size_t temp = result_linear;
3576 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3577 if (d == static_cast<int>(ax)) {
3578 result_idx[d] = 0;
3579 } else if (d < static_cast<int>(ax)) {
3580 result_idx[d] = temp / inner;
3581 temp %= inner;
3582 } else {
3583 result_idx[d] = temp % result_dims[d];
3584 temp /= result_dims[d];
3585 }
3586 }
3587
3588 result[result_idx] = sum;
3589 }
3590 }
3591
3592 // Setup backward pass
3593 if (requires_grad_) {
3594 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
3595 TensorIndices<N> self_dims = dims_;
3596 size_t reduce_axis = ax;
3597
3598 result.register_backward([self_ptr, self_dims, reduce_axis](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
3599 // Gradient of sum: broadcast gradient back to original shape
3600 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3601 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3602 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3603 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3604 }
3605
3606 // Each element in the original tensor contributed to one element in the sum
3607 // So gradient is just broadcast of the output gradient
3608 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
3609 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3610 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3611 size_t temp = i;
3612 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3613 idx[d] = temp % self_dims[d];
3614 temp /= self_dims[d];
3615 }
3616
3617 TensorIndices<N> grad_idx = idx;
3618 grad_idx[reduce_axis] = 0; // Sum reduced this dimension
3619
3620 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad[grad_idx];
3621 }
3622
3623 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3624 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3625 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3626 }
3627 }
3628 }
3629 });
3630 }
3631
3632 return result;
3633 }
3634
3641 Tensor<T, N> mean_axis(int axis, bool keepdims = false) const {
3642 auto sum_result = sum_axis(axis, keepdims);
3643
3644 if (axis < 0) {
3645 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3646 }
3647
3648 T count = static_cast<T>(dims_[axis]);
3649
3650 // Divide by count
3651 Tensor<T, N> result = sum_result * (T(1) / count);
3652
3653 return result;
3654 }
3655
3691 Tensor<T, N> softmax(int axis = -1) const {
3692 if (axis < 0) {
3693 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3694 }
3695
3696 if (axis < 0 || axis >= static_cast<int>(N)) {
3697 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3698 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3699 }
3700
3701 size_t ax = static_cast<size_t>(axis);
3702
3703 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3704 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3705
3706 // Compute softmax with numerical stability (subtract max)
3707 size_t outer = 1;
3708 for (size_t i = 0; i < ax; ++i) {
3709 outer *= dims_[i];
3710 }
3711
3712 size_t softmax_dim = dims_[ax];
3713
3714 size_t inner = 1;
3715 for (size_t i = ax + 1; i < N; ++i) {
3716 inner *= dims_[i];
3717 }
3718
3719 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
3720 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
3721 // Find max for numerical stability
3722 T max_val = std::numeric_limits<T>::lowest();
3723 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3724 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3725 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3726
3727 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3728 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3729 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3730 temp /= dims_[d];
3731 }
3732
3733 max_val = std::max(max_val, (*this)[idx]);
3734 }
3735
3736 // Compute exp(x - max) and sum
3737 T sum_exp = T(0);
3738 std::vector<T> exp_vals(softmax_dim);
3739
3740 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3741 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3742 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3743
3744 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3745 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3746 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3747 temp /= dims_[d];
3748 }
3749
3750 exp_vals[s] = std::exp((*this)[idx] - max_val);
3751 sum_exp += exp_vals[s];
3752 }
3753
3754 // Normalize
3755 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3756 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3757 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3758
3759 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3760 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3761 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3762 temp /= dims_[d];
3763 }
3764
3765 result[idx] = exp_vals[s] / sum_exp;
3766 }
3767 }
3768 }
3769
3770 // Setup backward pass
3771 if (requires_grad_) {
3772 Tensor<T, N> output_copy = result.detach();
3773 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
3774 size_t softmax_axis = ax;
3775 TensorIndices<N> self_dims = dims_;
3776
3777 result.register_backward([self_ptr, output_copy, softmax_axis, self_dims, outer, softmax_dim, inner]
3778 (const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
3779 // Gradient of softmax:
3780 // dsoftmax_i/dx_j = softmax_i * (_ij - softmax_j)
3781 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3782 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3783 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3784 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3785 }
3786
3787 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
3788 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
3789 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3790 TensorIndices<N> idx_s;
3791 size_t linear_s = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3792
3793 size_t temp = linear_s;
3794 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3795 idx_s[d] = temp % self_dims[d];
3796 temp /= self_dims[d];
3797 }
3798
3799 T sum = T(0);
3800 for (size_t j = 0; j < softmax_dim; ++j) {
3801 TensorIndices<N> idx_j = idx_s;
3802 idx_j[softmax_axis] = j;
3803
3804 T delta_ij = (s == j) ? T(1) : T(0);
3805 sum += grad[idx_j] * (delta_ij - output_copy[idx_j]);
3806 }
3807
3808 (*self_ptr->grad_)[idx_s] += output_copy[idx_s] * sum;
3809 }
3810 }
3811 }
3812
3813 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3814 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3815 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3816 }
3817 }
3818 }
3819 });
3820 }
3821
3822 return result;
3823 }
3824
3831 Tensor<T, N> log_softmax(int axis = -1) const {
3832 // More numerically stable than log(softmax(x))
3833 if (axis < 0) {
3834 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3835 }
3836
3837 // log_softmax(x) = x - max(x) - log(sum(exp(x - max(x))))
3838 // This avoids computing softmax explicitly
3839
3840 size_t ax = static_cast<size_t>(axis);
3841 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3842 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3843
3844 size_t outer = 1;
3845 for (size_t i = 0; i < ax; ++i) {
3846 outer *= dims_[i];
3847 }
3848
3849 size_t softmax_dim = dims_[ax];
3850
3851 size_t inner = 1;
3852 for (size_t i = ax + 1; i < N; ++i) {
3853 inner *= dims_[i];
3854 }
3855
3856 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
3857 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
3858 // Find max
3859 T max_val = std::numeric_limits<T>::lowest();
3860 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3861 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3862 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3863
3864 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3865 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3866 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3867 temp /= dims_[d];
3868 }
3869
3870 max_val = std::max(max_val, (*this)[idx]);
3871 }
3872
3873 // Compute log(sum(exp(x - max)))
3874 T log_sum_exp = T(0);
3875 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3876 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3877 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3878
3879 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3880 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3881 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3882 temp /= dims_[d];
3883 }
3884
3885 log_sum_exp += std::exp((*this)[idx] - max_val);
3886 }
3887 log_sum_exp = std::log(log_sum_exp);
3888
3889 // Compute result: x - max - log_sum_exp
3890 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
3891 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3892 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
3893
3894 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3895 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3896 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3897 temp /= dims_[d];
3898 }
3899
3900 result[idx] = (*this)[idx] - max_val - log_sum_exp;
3901 }
3902 }
3903 }
3904
3905 // Backward pass for log_softmax
3906 if (requires_grad_) {
3907 Tensor<T, N> output_copy = result.detach();
3908 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
3909
3910 result.register_backward([self_ptr, output_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
3911 // d/dx[log_softmax(x)] = 1 - softmax(x) for diagonal
3912 // Gradient: grad_input = grad_output - softmax(x) * sum(grad_output)
3913 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3914 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3915 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3916 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3917 }
3918
3919 // Compute softmax from log_softmax
3920 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
3921 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3922 T softmax_val = std::exp(output_copy.data_[i]);
3923
3924 // Compute sum of gradients (simplified for now)
3925 T grad_sum = grad.data_[i];
3926
3927 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i] - softmax_val * grad_sum;
3928 }
3929
3930 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3931 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3932 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3933 }
3934 }
3935 }
3936 });
3937 }
3938
3939 return result;
3940 }
3941
3942 // ==================== PHASE 3: ADVANCED TENSOR OPERATIONS ====================
3943
3950 template<size_t M>
3951 Tensor<T, M> reshape(const TensorIndices<M>& new_dims) const {
3952 size_t new_total = 1;
3953 for (size_t i = 0; i < M; ++i) {
3954 new_total *= new_dims[i];
3955 }
3956
3957 if (new_total != total_size()) {
3958 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
3959 return Tensor<T, M>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3960 }
3961
3962 Tensor<T, M> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3963 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3964
3965 // Copy data
3966 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), result.data_.get());
3967
3968 // Setup backward pass
3969 if (requires_grad_) {
3970 TensorIndices<N> orig_dims = dims_;
3971 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
3972
3973 result.register_backward([self_ptr, orig_dims](const Tensor<T, M>& grad) {
3974 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3975 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3976 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(orig_dims,
3977 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3978 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3979 }
3980
3981 // Gradient flows back with same reshape
3982 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
3983 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3984 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
3985 }
3986
3987 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3988 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3989 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3990 }
3991 }
3992 }
3993 });
3994 }
3995
3996 return result;
3997 }
3998
4004 Tensor<T, N> transpose() const {
4005 static_assert(N >= 2, "Transpose requires at least 2 dimensions");
4006
4007 TensorIndices<N> new_dims = dims_;
4008 std::swap(new_dims[N-2], new_dims[N-1]);
4009
4010 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4011 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4012
4013 // Transpose the last two dimensions
4014 if constexpr (N == 2) {
4015 for (size_t i = 0; i < dims_[0]; ++i) {
4016 for (size_t j = 0; j < dims_[1]; ++j) {
4017 result[{j, i}] = (*this)[{i, j}];
4018 }
4019 }
4020 } else {
4021 // For N>2, transpose last two dims while iterating over others
4022 size_t outer = 1;
4023 for (size_t i = 0; i < N-2; ++i) {
4024 outer *= dims_[i];
4025 }
4026
4027 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4028 // Compute indices for outer dimensions
4029 TensorIndices<N> base_idx;
4030 size_t temp = o;
4031 for (int i = N-3; i >= 0; --i) {
4032 base_idx[i] = temp % dims_[i];
4033 temp /= dims_[i];
4034 }
4035
4036 for (size_t i = 0; i < dims_[N-2]; ++i) {
4037 for (size_t j = 0; j < dims_[N-1]; ++j) {
4038 TensorIndices<N> src_idx = base_idx;
4039 TensorIndices<N> dst_idx = base_idx;
4040 src_idx[N-2] = i;
4041 src_idx[N-1] = j;
4042 dst_idx[N-2] = j;
4043 dst_idx[N-1] = i;
4044 result[dst_idx] = (*this)[src_idx];
4045 }
4046 }
4047 }
4048 }
4049
4050 // Setup backward pass
4051 if (requires_grad_) {
4052 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4053
4054 result.register_backward([self_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4055 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4056 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4057 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4058 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4059 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4060 }
4061
4062 // Gradient of transpose is transpose of gradient
4063 Tensor<T, N> grad_transposed = grad.transpose();
4064 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4065 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4066 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad_transposed.data_[i];
4067 }
4068
4069 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4070 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4071 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4072 }
4073 }
4074 }
4075 });
4076 }
4077
4078 return result;
4079 }
4080
4086 Tensor<T, N> permute(const TensorIndices<N>& axes) const {
4087 // Validate that axes is a permutation
4088 std::array<bool, N> seen = {false};
4089 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4090 if (axes[i] >= N || seen[axes[i]]) {
4091 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4092 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4093 }
4094 seen[axes[i]] = true;
4095 }
4096
4097 // Compute new dimensions
4098 TensorIndices<N> new_dims;
4099 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4100 new_dims[i] = dims_[axes[i]];
4101 }
4102
4103 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4104 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4105
4106 // Permute data
4107 size_t total = total_size();
4108 for (size_t idx = 0; idx < total; ++idx) {
4109 // Convert linear index to multi-dimensional indices
4110 TensorIndices<N> src_idx;
4111 size_t temp = idx;
4112 for (int i = N-1; i >= 0; --i) {
4113 src_idx[i] = temp % dims_[i];
4114 temp /= dims_[i];
4115 }
4116
4117 // Permute indices
4118 TensorIndices<N> dst_idx;
4119 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4120 dst_idx[i] = src_idx[axes[i]];
4121 }
4122
4123 result[dst_idx] = (*this)[src_idx];
4124 }
4125
4126 // Setup backward pass
4127 if (requires_grad_) {
4128 TensorIndices<N> inv_axes;
4129 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4130 inv_axes[axes[i]] = i;
4131 }
4132
4133 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4134
4135 result.register_backward([self_ptr, inv_axes](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4136 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4137 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4138 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4139 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4140 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4141 }
4142
4143 // Gradient flows back with inverse permutation
4144 Tensor<T, N> grad_permuted = grad.permute(inv_axes);
4145 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4146 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4147 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad_permuted.data_[i];
4148 }
4149
4150 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4151 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4152 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4153 }
4154 }
4155 }
4156 });
4157 }
4158
4159 return result;
4160 }
4161
4167 Tensor<T, N> squeeze(int axis = -1) const {
4168 if (axis >= 0) {
4169 if (static_cast<size_t>(axis) >= N) {
4170 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4171 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4172 }
4173 if (dims_[axis] != 1) {
4174 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4175 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4176 }
4177 }
4178
4179 // For simplicity, return a copy with same dimensions
4180 // A proper implementation would change rank
4181 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4182 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4183
4184 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), result.data_.get());
4185
4186 if (requires_grad_) {
4187 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4188
4189 result.register_backward([self_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4190 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4191 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4192 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4193 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4194 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4195 }
4196
4197 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4198 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4199 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
4200 }
4201
4202 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4203 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4204 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4205 }
4206 }
4207 }
4208 });
4209 }
4210
4211 return result;
4212 }
4213
4219 template<size_t M = N + 1>
4220 Tensor<T, M> unsqueeze(size_t axis) const {
4221 if (axis > N) {
4222 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4223 return Tensor<T, M>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4224 }
4225
4226 TensorIndices<M> new_dims;
4227 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4228 new_dims[i] = dims_[i];
4229 }
4230 new_dims[axis] = 1;
4231 for (size_t i = axis; i < N; ++i) {
4232 new_dims[i+1] = dims_[i];
4233 }
4234
4235 Tensor<T, M> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4236 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4237
4238 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), result.data_.get());
4239
4240 if (requires_grad_) {
4241 TensorIndices<N> orig_dims = dims_;
4242 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4243
4244 result.register_backward([self_ptr, orig_dims](const Tensor<T, M>& grad) {
4245 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4246 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4247 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(orig_dims,
4248 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4249 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4250 }
4251
4252 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4253 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4254 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
4255 }
4256
4257 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4258 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4259 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4260 }
4261 }
4262 }
4263 });
4264 }
4265
4266 return result;
4267 }
4268
4275 Tensor<T, N> concatenate(const Tensor<T, N>& other, size_t axis) const {
4276 if (axis >= N) {
4277 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4278 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4279 }
4280
4281 // Check that all dimensions match except the concat axis
4282 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4283 if (i != axis && dims_[i] != other.dims_[i]) {
4284 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4285 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4286 }
4287 }
4288
4289 TensorIndices<N> new_dims = dims_;
4290 new_dims[axis] = dims_[axis] + other.dims_[axis];
4291
4292 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
4293 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, track_grad);
4294 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4295
4296 // Copy data from first tensor
4297 size_t outer = 1;
4298 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4299 outer *= dims_[i];
4300 }
4301
4302 size_t inner = 1;
4303 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4304 inner *= dims_[i];
4305 }
4306
4307 size_t this_axis_size = dims_[axis];
4308 size_t other_axis_size = other.dims_[axis];
4309
4310 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4311 // Copy from first tensor
4312 for (size_t a = 0; a < this_axis_size; ++a) {
4313 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4314 size_t src_idx = o * this_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4315 size_t dst_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner + a * inner + i;
4316 result.data_[dst_idx] = data_[src_idx];
4317 }
4318 }
4319
4320 // Copy from second tensor
4321 for (size_t a = 0; a < other_axis_size; ++a) {
4322 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4323 size_t src_idx = o * other_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4324 size_t dst_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner +
4325 (this_axis_size + a) * inner + i;
4326 result.data_[dst_idx] = other.data_[src_idx];
4327 }
4328 }
4329 }
4330
4331 // Setup backward pass
4332 if (track_grad) {
4333 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4334 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
4335
4336 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr, axis, outer, inner,
4337 this_axis_size, other_axis_size](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4338 // Split gradient back to both tensors
4339 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4340 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4341 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4342 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4343 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4344 }
4345
4346 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4347 for (size_t a = 0; a < this_axis_size; ++a) {
4348 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4349 size_t dst_idx = o * this_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4350 size_t src_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner + a * inner + i;
4351 self_ptr->grad_->data_[dst_idx] += grad.data_[src_idx];
4352 }
4353 }
4354 }
4355
4356 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4357 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4358 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4359 }
4360 }
4361 }
4362
4363 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4364 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
4365 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_,
4366 other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4367 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4368 }
4369
4370 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4371 for (size_t a = 0; a < other_axis_size; ++a) {
4372 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4373 size_t dst_idx = o * other_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4374 size_t src_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner +
4375 (this_axis_size + a) * inner + i;
4376 other_ptr->grad_->data_[dst_idx] += grad.data_[src_idx];
4377 }
4378 }
4379 }
4380
4381 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4382 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4383 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
4384 }
4385 }
4386 }
4387 });
4388 }
4389
4390 return result;
4391 }

4396
4403 Tensor<T, 1> take(const std::vector<size_t>& indices) const {
4404 Tensor<T, 1> result({indices.size()}, use_gpu_);
4405 size_t total = total_size();
4406
4407 for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
4408 if (indices[i] < total) {
4409 result.data_[i] = data_[indices[i]];
4410 } else {
4411 result.data_[i] = T(0); // Out of bounds returns zero
4412 }
4413 }
4414
4415 return result;
4416 }
4417
4424 void put(const std::vector<size_t>& indices, const std::vector<T>& values) {
4425 size_t count = std::min(indices.size(), values.size());
4426 size_t total = total_size();
4427
4428 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
4429 if (indices[i] < total) {
4430 data_[indices[i]] = values[i];
4431 }
4432 }
4433 }
4434
4441 Tensor<T, 1> index_select(const Tensor<T, N>& mask) const {
4442 return masked_select(mask);
4443 }
4444
4453 template<size_t M = (N > 1 ? N - 1 : 1)>
4454 std::enable_if_t<(N > 1), Tensor<T, M>> select(size_t dim, size_t index) const {
4455 if (dim >= N || index >= dims_[dim]) {
4456 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4457 return Tensor<T, M>(zero_dims, use_gpu_);
4458 }
4459
4460 // Calculate new dimensions (removing the selected dimension)
4461 TensorIndices<M> new_dims;
4462 size_t new_idx = 0;
4463 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4464 if (i != dim) {
4465 new_dims[new_idx++] = dims_[i];
4466 }
4467 }
4468
4469 Tensor<T, M> result(new_dims, use_gpu_);
4470
4471 // Copy selected slice
4472 size_t result_total = result.total_size();
4473 size_t stride = strides_[dim];
4474 size_t dim_size = dims_[dim];
4475
4476 // Calculate outer and inner sizes
4477 size_t outer = 1;
4478 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim; ++i) {
4479 outer *= dims_[i];
4480 }
4481
4482 size_t inner = 1;
4483 for (size_t i = dim + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4484 inner *= dims_[i];
4485 }
4486
4487 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4488 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4489 size_t src_idx = o * dim_size * inner + index * inner + i;
4490 size_t dst_idx = o * inner + i;
4491 result.data_[dst_idx] = data_[src_idx];
4492 }
4493 }
4494
4495 return result;
4496 }
4497
4498 // ============================================
4499 // Advanced Reduction Operations
4500 // ============================================
4501
4508 Tensor<T, N> sum_axis(size_t axis, bool keepdims = false) const {
4509 if (axis >= N) {
4510 return *this;
4511 }
4512
4513 TensorIndices<N> new_dims = dims_;
4514 new_dims[axis] = 1;
4515 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, false);
4516 result.fill(T(0));
4517
4518 // Calculate strides for iteration
4519 size_t outer = 1;
4520 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4521 outer *= dims_[i];
4522 }
4523
4524 size_t inner = 1;
4525 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4526 inner *= dims_[i];
4527 }
4528
4529 size_t axis_size = dims_[axis];
4530
4531 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4532 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4533 for (size_t a = 0; a < axis_size; ++a) {
4534 size_t src_idx = o * axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4535 size_t dst_idx = o * inner + i;
4536 result.data_[dst_idx] += data_[src_idx];
4537 }
4538 }
4539 }
4540
4541 // If requested, squeeze the result (remove dimension of size 1)
4542 if (!keepdims && N > 1) {
4543 // Return as-is with size 1 dimension
4544 // Full squeeze would require changing dimension template parameter
4545 }
4546
4547 // Handle gradient tracking
4548 if (requires_grad_) {
4549 result.requires_grad_ = true;
4550 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4551
4552 auto self_ptr = std::make_shared<Tensor<T, N>>(*this);
4553 result.backward_funcs_.push_back([self_ptr, axis](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4554 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4555 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4556 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4557 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4558 }
4559
4560 // Broadcast gradient back to original shape
4561 size_t outer = 1;
4562 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4563 outer *= self_ptr->dims_[i];
4564 }
4565
4566 size_t inner = 1;
4567 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4568 inner *= self_ptr->dims_[i];
4569 }
4570
4571 size_t axis_size = self_ptr->dims_[axis];
4572
4573 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4574 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4575 size_t grad_idx = o * inner + i;
4576 for (size_t a = 0; a < axis_size; ++a) {
4577 size_t self_idx = o * axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4578 self_ptr->grad_->data_[self_idx] += grad.data_[grad_idx];
4579 }
4580 }
4581 }
4582
4583 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4584 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4585 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4586 }
4587 }
4588 });
4589 }
4590
4591 return result;
4592 }
4593
4600 Tensor<T, N> mean_axis(size_t axis, bool keepdims = false) const {
4601 if (axis >= N) {
4602 return *this;
4603 }
4604
4605 Tensor<T, N> result = sum_axis(axis, keepdims);
4606 T divisor = static_cast<T>(dims_[axis]);
4607
4608 size_t total = result.total_size();
4609 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4610 result.data_[i] /= divisor;
4611 }
4612
4613 return result;
4614 }

4627 if (data_[i] > max_val) {
4628 max_val = data_[i];

4633 return max_idx;

4641 size_t argmin() const {

4645
4646 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {

4648 min_val = data_[i];

4655
4662 template<size_t M = (N > 1 ? N - 1 : 1)>
4663 std::enable_if_t<(N > 1), Tensor<size_t, M>> argmax_axis(size_t axis) const {
4664 if (axis >= N) {
4665 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4666 return Tensor<size_t, M>(zero_dims, false);
4667 }
4668
4669 // Calculate new dimensions (removing the axis dimension)
4670 TensorIndices<M> new_dims;
4671 size_t new_idx = 0;
4672 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4673 if (i != axis) {
4674 new_dims[new_idx++] = dims_[i];
4675 }
4676 }
4677
4678 Tensor<size_t, M> result(new_dims, false);
4679
4680 size_t outer = 1;
4681 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4682 outer *= dims_[i];
4683 }
4684
4685 size_t inner = 1;
4686 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4687 inner *= dims_[i];
4688 }
4689
4690 size_t axis_size = dims_[axis];
4691
4692 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4693 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4694 size_t max_idx = 0;
4695 T max_val = data_[o * axis_size * inner + i];
4696
4697 for (size_t a = 1; a < axis_size; ++a) {
4698 size_t src_idx = o * axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4699 if (data_[src_idx] > max_val) {
4700 max_val = data_[src_idx];
4701 max_idx = a;
4702 }
4703 }
4704
4705 size_t dst_idx = o * inner + i;
4706 result.data()[dst_idx] = max_idx;
4707 }
4708 }
4709
4710 return result;
4711 }
4712
4719 template<size_t M = (N > 1 ? N - 1 : 1)>
4720 std::enable_if_t<(N > 1), Tensor<size_t, M>> argmin_axis(size_t axis) const {
4721 if (axis >= N) {
4722 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4723 return Tensor<size_t, M>(zero_dims, false);
4724 }
4725
4726 // Calculate new dimensions (removing the axis dimension)
4727 TensorIndices<M> new_dims;
4728 size_t new_idx = 0;
4729 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4730 if (i != axis) {
4731 new_dims[new_idx++] = dims_[i];
4732 }
4733 }
4734
4735 Tensor<size_t, M> result(new_dims, false);
4736
4737 size_t outer = 1;
4738 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4739 outer *= dims_[i];
4740 }
4741
4742 size_t inner = 1;
4743 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4744 inner *= dims_[i];
4745 }
4746
4747 size_t axis_size = dims_[axis];
4748
4749 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4750 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4751 size_t min_idx = 0;
4752 T min_val = data_[o * axis_size * inner + i];
4753
4754 for (size_t a = 1; a < axis_size; ++a) {
4755 size_t src_idx = o * axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4756 if (data_[src_idx] < min_val) {
4757 min_val = data_[src_idx];
4758 min_idx = a;
4759 }
4760 }
4761
4762 size_t dst_idx = o * inner + i;
4763 result.data()[dst_idx] = min_idx;
4764 }
4765 }
4766
4767 return result;
4768 }
4769
4774 Tensor<T, N> cumsum() const {
4775 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
4776 size_t total = total_size();
4777
4778 if (total > 0) {
4779 result.data_[0] = data_[0];
4780 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {
4781 result.data_[i] = result.data_[i-1] + data_[i];
4782 }
4783 }
4784
4785 return result;
4786 }
4787
4792 Tensor<T, N> cumprod() const {
4793 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
4794 size_t total = total_size();
4795
4796 if (total > 0) {
4797 result.data_[0] = data_[0];
4798 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {
4799 result.data_[i] = result.data_[i-1] * data_[i];
4800 }
4801 }
4802
4803 return result;
4804 }
4805
4811 Tensor<T, N> cumsum_axis(size_t axis) const {
4812 if (axis >= N) {
4813 throw std::out_of_range("Axis out of bounds");
4814 }
4815
4816 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
4817
4818 // Compute strides
4819 std::array<size_t, N> strides;
4820 strides[N-1] = 1;
4821 for (size_t i = N-1; i-- > 0;) {
4822 strides[i] = strides[i+1] * dims_[i+1];
4823 }
4824
4825 size_t outer = 1;
4826 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4827 outer *= dims_[i];
4828 }
4829
4830 size_t inner = 1;
4831 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4832 inner *= dims_[i];
4833 }
4834
4835 size_t axis_size = dims_[axis];
4836
4837 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4838 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4839 T cumulative = T(0);
4840 for (size_t a = 0; a < axis_size; ++a) {
4841 size_t idx = o * axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4842 cumulative += data_[idx];
4843 result.data_[idx] = cumulative;
4844 }
4845 }
4846 }
4847
4848 return result;
4849 }
4850
4856 Tensor<T, N> cumprod_axis(size_t axis) const {
4857 if (axis >= N) {
4858 throw std::out_of_range("Axis out of bounds");
4859 }
4860
4861 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
4862
4863 // Compute strides
4864 std::array<size_t, N> strides;
4865 strides[N-1] = 1;
4866 for (size_t i = N-1; i-- > 0;) {
4867 strides[i] = strides[i+1] * dims_[i+1];
4868 }
4869
4870 size_t outer = 1;
4871 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4872 outer *= dims_[i];
4873 }
4874
4875 size_t inner = 1;
4876 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4877 inner *= dims_[i];
4878 }
4879
4880 size_t axis_size = dims_[axis];
4881
4882 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4883 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4884 T cumulative = T(1);
4885 for (size_t a = 0; a < axis_size; ++a) {
4886 size_t idx = o * axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4887 cumulative *= data_[idx];
4888 result.data_[idx] = cumulative;
4889 }
4890 }
4891 }
4892
4893 return result;
4894 }
4895
4900 T prod() const {
4901 T result = T(1);
4902 size_t total = total_size();
4903
4904 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4905 result *= data_[i];
4906 }
4907
4908 return result;
4909 }
4910
4915 bool any() const {
4916 size_t total = total_size();
4917 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4918 if (data_[i] != T(0)) {
4919 return true;
4920 }
4921 }
4922 return false;
4923 }
4924
4929 bool all() const {
4930 size_t total = total_size();
4931 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4932 if (data_[i] == T(0)) {
4933 return false;
4934 }
4935 }
4936 return true;
4937 }
